mapper.select: select cafe_comment_number, m.member_nickname, cafe_comment_content, cafe_comment_date, cafe_comment_score, m.member_number, study_cafe_number from tbl_study_cafe_comment scc join tbl_member m where study_cafe_number = 178 and m.member_number = scc.member_number
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_study_cafe_comment (cafe_comment_content, cafe_comment_score, member_number, study_cafe_number) values(#{cafeCommentContent}, #{cafeCommentScore}, #{#memberNumber}, #{studyCafeNumber})
